Name: Family Day Care, Sunset Provision
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a sunset provision of legislation on family day care.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
	Section 1.  Section 3 of local law number 45 for the year 1992, as last amended by local law number 37 for the year 1999, is amended to read as follows:
	Section 3. This local law shall take effect immediately and expire on [October 15,1999] January 30, 2000.
	ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately, provided, however, that if this local law is enacted subsequent to October 15, 1999, it shall be deemed to have been in full force and effect on October 15, 1999.
